author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-157 - implemented functionality.  Remembered principals will automatically be added to the session, and if there isn't a session, a new one will be created to receive the principals.  This ensures that the RememberMeManager will only be consulted if a session does not yet have an identity associated with it.

author: rajith
msg: There are a number of test failures under the various cpp test profiles.
I am temporarily excluding them to keep the tests green, to ensure we don't miss any new failures.
Meanwhile I work on the test failures to figure out cause.
